name: Maxim Edge
description:
Maxim Edge Search Engine Marketing is a leading internet marketing firm. 
They have developed an expert team of SEO strategist, designers, social media marketing gurus, and coders.
Maxim Edge has become the go-to source for Internet Marketing in the Denver Metro Area.  Maxim Edge believes in on-time reporting, transparency, and of course; Results. When clients have questions, they can call and get the answers. No more signing a contract and being forgotten.
